## [Elevation Maps in R](https://umairdurrani.com/posts/2020-12-25-elevation-maps-in-r/elevation-maps-in-r)

By Dr. U

**What is this?**

This comprehensive tutorial demonstrates how to create aesthetically pleasing and informative elevation maps in R using ground elevation data.
The author guides readers through the process of obtaining elevation data, processing it, and visualizing it using various R packages.

The tutorial provides detailed code snippets and explanations, making it accessible for users aiming to enhance their geospatial data visualization skills in R.
